references.paper_title: Bpr: Bayesian personalized ranking from implicit feedback
references.reason: This paper introduces Bayesian Personalized Ranking (BPR), a pairwise loss function that's foundational to many ranking-based recommendation models and is directly related to the proposed PSL loss.

references.paper_title: On the effectiveness of sampled softmax loss for item recommendation
references.reason: This paper analyzes the widely used Softmax Loss (SL) in recommender systems, identifying limitations that motivate the development of the proposed PSL loss function.

references.paper_title: Bsl: Understanding and improving softmax loss for recommendation
references.reason: This paper enhances Softmax Loss (SL) using Distributionally Robust Optimization (DRO), which the current paper also leverages in the development of PSL.

references.paper_title: Lightgcn: Simplifying and powering graph convolution network for recommendation
references.reason: This paper introduces LightGCN, a widely-used graph-based recommendation model which serves as one of the baselines in the experimental evaluation of the proposed PSL loss.
This paper introduces Distributionally Robust Optimization (DRO), a theoretical framework that underpins the robustness properties of the proposed PSL loss.
